name: FUTURE FARM
description:
Future Farm!

A short little ambient horror game made for halloween! As the world collapses you defend your farm. Use  space bar to start !!!

USE SPACEBAR WHEN PROMPTED TO ADVANCE

USE ARROW KEYS FOR LEFT AND RIGHT

USE A - TO RAISE GUN TO SHOOT

USE S - TO LOWER GUN AND RELOAD A BULLET

USE UP ARROW - TO SHOOT WHILE GUN IS RAISED

PRESS 'S' REPEATEDLY - TO RELOAD ! - 

DON'T DIE
